_comment: KDS Configuration Template - Copy this to kds.config.json and customize for your project

application.name: YOUR_PROJECT_NAME
application.framework: YOUR_FRAMEWORK (e.g., Blazor, React, Vue, Angular, Django)
application.buildCommand: YOUR_BUILD_COMMAND (e.g., dotnet build, npm run build, or empty string)
application.runCommand: YOUR_RUN_COMMAND (e.g., dotnet run, npm run dev, or empty string)

testing.framework: YOUR_TEST_FRAMEWORK (e.g., Playwright, Cypress, Jest, Selenium, or None)
testing.orchestrationPattern: ORCHESTRATION_TYPE (e.g., v3.0-direct-dotnet, npm-scripts, custom, or empty string)
testing.testCommand: TEST_EXECUTION_COMMAND (e.g., npx playwright test, or empty string)

database.provider: DATABASE_PROVIDER (e.g., SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, SQLite, or None)
database.connectionStringKey: CONNECTION_STRING_KEY (e.g., DefaultConnection, DATABASE_URL, or empty string)
